You have cookies disabled. Please enable: You have cookies disabled. Please enable them in your browser to successfully use the platform
checkmark-description: This check mark indicates that a licensee has gone through our licensee due diligence verification to make sure they are a real company.
checkmark-description-long: This check mark signifies that we have performed financial viability, historical, identification, legal infringement, and negative news checks on this client.  As with any platform on the internet, we cannot guarantee 100% success rate within our verification methods. Please help us keep our platform extra safe by making sure you perform your own due diligence prior to entering into licensing agreements with other users, and by reporting any suspicious activity to us at

brand-specialist.brand-text: Scheduling meetings with brand strategists can increase a company's success on the platform as they aid in effectively communicating goals, positioning in the market and connecting with potential partners.
brand-specialist.brand-header: Book a meeting with a brand strategist

brand-added.text: Are you looking to maximize the potential of your brand? Our team of brand strategists can help you do just that. Let’s chat about how we can work together to elevate your brand and achieve your goals. Book a meeting with us today to learn more.
brand-added.header: Congratulations, your Brand has successfully been added

cookie-terms: By clicking “Accept All Cookies”, you accept that we use cookies on our site to provide you with the best experience, by enhancing site and service navigation, analyzing our traffic, improving our products and services and with targeted marketing efforts. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners. You can come back at any time to edit these settings. For more information, please visit our cookie policy and privacy policy.

due-diligence.title: Due Diligence Questionnaire
due-diligence.description: Please complete the rest of the due diligence questions in order to participate in deal-making on the BIP platform.
due-diligence.agency-acting-behalf-company: <primary>Are you an agency that is operating </primary><secondary>on behalf of a company/brand?</secondary>
due-diligence.agency-acting-behalf-company-name: <primary>Please enter <secondary>the name of the company</secondary> you are operating on behalf of</primary>
due-diligence.agency-acting-behalf-company-agreement: <primary>Please provide <secondary>a copy (or portion of) the agreement</secondary> that includes the name of both your company and the company you are working on behalf of</primary>
due-diligence.active-insurance-policy: <primary>Does your organization maintain </primary><secondary>an active insurance policy?</secondary>
due-diligence.active-insurance-policy-lack-coverage-de: <primary>Please provide any details relating to the lack of </primary><secondary>insurance coverage</secondary>
due-diligence.active-insurance-policy-certificate: <primary>Please attach a copy of your </primary><secondary>certificate of insurance</secondary>
due-diligence.dbas: <primary>Please list any <secondary>"Doing Business As"</secondary> or other names your organization actively uses</primary>
due-diligence.business-license: <primary>Please provide a copy of your </primary><secondary>most recent business license</secondary>
due-diligence.specialty-certifications: <primary>Are you required to maintain <secondary>specialty certification(s)</secondary> within your industry?</primary>
due-diligence.specialty-certifications-certificates: <primary>Please provide a copy of other </primary><secondary>applicable certification(s)</secondary>
due-diligence.attest-true-and-correct: <primary>Do you attest that all information found within this form is </primary><secondary>accurate to the best of your knowledge?</secondary>
due-diligence.thank-you-for-submitting: Thank you for submitting your responses. We are currently reviewing your response and will activate the full potential of your account shortly!

due-diligence.complete-due-diligence-module: Deals are much more likely to be accepted by verified licensees! Complete the due diligence module HERE

plans-selection.title: Our Plans
plans-selection.self_service-description: 12% of the Agreed Upon Royalty & Advance
plans-selection.self_service-tip: Example: a 10% royalty would result in a fee due to BIP of 1.2% and the licensor would result in a final payment 8.8%. Licensor will pay BIP its fee of 1.2% 30 days after receiving payment from the Licensee.
plans-selection.full_service-description: 22% of the  Agreed Upon Royalty & Advance
plans-selection.full_service-tip: Example: a 10% royalty would result in a fee due to BIP of 2.2% and the licensor would result in a final payment 7.8%. Licensor will pay BIP its fee of 2.2% 30 days after receiving payment from the Licensee.
